title: If you want to buff rammus and amumu jungle without actually changing anything Major!
body:
Make jungle monsters attack a lot faster, but lower their damage so that its a net neutral. 

Rammus w and amumu e will allow for faster clears. 

But I know this won't get enough attention so.... so much for trying to help with ideas for rito balance.


Edit: or buff those skill's interactions with monsters.
